DataElement.preferredName: EPIC-26 - Frequency of Erections Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation in the past 4 weeks their frequency of erections, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Questionnaire Domain EPIC-26 - Frequency of Erections Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire._The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form (EPIC-26) How would you describe the frequency of your erections during the last 4 weeks?_A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CDSIC aligned NCI Standard CRFs. wz

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard related to the frequency of erections associated with the EPIC measure.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection WHENEVER I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection WHENEVER I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection whenever they wanted one.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection whenever they wanted one.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I NEVER had an erection when I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I NEVER had an erection when I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual never has or had an erection when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Never Have Erection When Want One
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual never has or had an erection when they wanted one.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection LESS THAN HALF the time I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection LESS THAN HALF the time I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection less than half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Have Erection Less Than Half the Time
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection less than half the time when they wanted one.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection ABOUT HALF the time I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection ABOUT HALF the time I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection about half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Have Erection About Half the Time
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection about half the time when they wanted one.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection MORE THAN HALF the time I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection MORE THAN HALF the time I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection more than half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.longName: Have Erection More Than Half the Time
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection more than half the time when they wanted one.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: How would you describe the FR
ReferenceDocuments.description: How would you describe the FREQUENCY of your erections during the last 4 weeks?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 5105736 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
